A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While it’s got some genuinely funny moments\, this was the most boring Star Wars by far. Snoke is wiped away before we know anything about him\, the movie drags on without anything happening we care about\, and the way they handled Luke Skywalker is downright offensive. Not only the worst Star Wars movie by itself\, it actually hurts the entire Star Wars story. Honestly wish I never saw it.
